Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.10.2012 SH SCR17619 Skip second GB723 argument
16.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and added PI.ADMNO
20.01.2006 SH SCR10150 Changed parameters and selections of DEBC
22.11.2005 JJ SCR9516, no GB723 for text file
21.09.2005 JJ SCR9136/9141 txt Workaround I/O format: none; CrLf on form
20.09.2005 JJ req JDO Fixed type v.GNRL)_CURRENCY
08.09.2005 SH SCR8572 Added PI.ADMNO and PI.CLNTNO
25.08.2005 SH SCR8572 Changed calc of INVO amount/numbers to calc from DEBB to increase performace
04.07.2005 SH SCR8628 Added new part to create second file (CSV)
21.09.2005 JJ SCR 9136/9141 WORKAROUND, CrLf on output form
... parameters are optinal
-- Convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format, only if BMN574
runs nativ on AS400
-- Reset variables
... if amounts for selected debtor are all 0 no line has to be written to file
... prepare output line for selected debtor

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DCMO_TOTASALESDEBTNOTES) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO = :2 and DCMO_YEAR = :3 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':4' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select distinct DEBC_CLNTNO from :1/debc :2 order by DEBC_CLNTNO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- Reset variables
... if amounts for selected client are all 0 no line has to be written to file
... prepare output line for selected client

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/invo where INVO_ADMNO = :3 and INVO_CLNTNO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALH <> 0 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/cmon where CMON_ADMNO = :6 and CMON_CLNTNO = :2 and CMON_YEAR = :3 and CMON_MONTH = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
